website_summaries.verdict: The best option for a more authentic hard bonnet hair dryer experience.
pros: Full bonnet dryer comes with stand for easier positioning
Delivers a similar hair drying experience as the hooded bonnet dryers in a salon
cons: Much larger than other hair dryers

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, NOt very powerful at all. No cool setting. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: The price was reasonable but the quality was inferior to ...
customer_reviews.text: The price was reasonable but the quality was inferior to my previous Conair dome hair dryer. The dome latch barely held the dome in closed position. The blower on medium heat quickly developed an electrical smell. I am returning this dryer immediately.
customer_reviews.author: carol mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dry my loc in the winter months after a wash. This dryer get hot enough to dry my shoulder length hair in a reasonable amount of time. I do have to put my hair on top of my head to dry the ends but that's not a big deal. It's not any more noisy than any other dryer I've owned. I would recommend this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: ShamekaNicole

customer_reviews.title: Air only came out of one side.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because the air was only coming from the back right side. So I kept having to shift while drying for it to get to my whole head.
customer_reviews.author: Hoopla

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer gets really hot and dries hair quickly, but it also burns your hair as it gets too hot. It does not tilt at the neck to adjust to your head. It will also trip circuit breakers after running about 5 minutes. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Toon

customer_reviews.title: would look for something better.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, it is not really adjustable , I can't get the plastic out of the slots to raisit up. NOISY, NOISY, NOISY I have to keep it on low because medium and high the noise level is redicuilous, noisy even on low. Drying capabikities okay. Does not compare at all to my last old stlle big plastic one. Would not buy again, would look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this dryer for a year now... and it just stopped blowing hot air to dry my hair. We looked for a reset button, but did not find one. Plus, it only dried the top and middle of my hair... the lower back never dried in the same amount of time as the rest because the air could not get to it. I'm totally unhappy, but I had to have a dryer so I bought the hooded one, it is to arrive today, and this one is going in the trash. (safely disassembled for recycling)
customer_reviews.author: Karendae

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s horrible!!!! Plastic piece of garbage. Highly noisy and flimsy. I had better expectations of Revlon and will never purchase a product of theirs again.! Highly Disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha N.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but wish there was a cooler setting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dryer for a year and I still love it. My hair is so thin that a regular diffuser just blows it all crazy. This hood dryer dries in place for way better curl/wave definition and shine. I which it had a cooler setting with the higher airflow though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D. Tischner

customer_reviews.title: Worked five times then dead
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this dryer at first. It folds down for easy storage and had great heating power. However, we used it approximately five times and it quit working. It won’t turn on and is just completely dead. I emailed Revlon directly and never heard back. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: ... couple times and it dried my hair and wig fine. No negatives so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used this dryer couple times and it dried my hair and wig fine. No negatives so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible only used 4 times and it won't turn ON anymore.....
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this dryer 4 times and it no longer works. Worst investment EVER! I'd like my money Back or a new one. SO DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crissii Luv

customer_reviews.title: Bonnet is brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bonnet for my mom who is home bound due to stroke. She does like to have her hair done regularly the old fashioned way (as she puts it)... the standard cut, set and hair bonnet that really sets the curlers into place. You can't beat the price. NOTE: The dryer does not have adjustable height mechanism... so parents use a few books as a lift for the dryer so it sits well on my mom's head (due to wheel chair). But happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Caldrono

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with them!
customer_reviews.text: Just now using it after I’ve had it in the box for a couple months and it don’t work!
customer_reviews.author: Lakesha Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me but should work well for shorter hair.
customer_reviews.text: This was not right for me. This would be perfectly fine for someone drying a little updo or anyone with shortish hair. Then it would be a really good value. I just got long extensions and because I have so much hair now, it is hard to get dry. So the problem with this style is that the heat vents are on the top. It’s the back my head that desperately needs drying (it takes a long time and I tire of standing and using blow dryer).
customer_reviews.author: PJS from Ann Arbor

customer_reviews.title: i love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that it would be flimsy and cheap based on other reviews and maybe I got lucky but no broken pieces. It is plastic but seems sturdy, especially if you're handling it carefully. I've used it the past two weekends and it's amazing! My hair is so thick but this gets very hot. Air holes are allover the inside but don't come all the way to the end of the bowl. Easy to use. Folds up conveniently. 2nd best purchase I've made on my hair in a longg time (behing the detangling brush) :)
customer_reviews.author: Regina Stokes

customer_reviews.title: It's like a blow dyer with a hood...and sounds like a freight train..lol
customer_reviews.text: Not like the good dryer I grew up with...lol..not relaxing like before in the old days..could watch T.V..do your nails..enjoy the process of drying your hair..over priced..and disappointed..and takes a long time to dry..and I am a hairstylist..I bought for the Ion feature...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerivette kenney

customer_reviews.title: Drys well but...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. I would have given this product five stars had it not been for the noise level. Make sure to invest in ear plugs and pain reliever.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have natural curly hair and helps me dry my hair faster in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: animalcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Broke on 2nd try
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is very cheaply made its almost the quality of a plastic toy, flimsy as hell. Plus it blew out on my 2nd use. Don’t even buy it, need to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This is a 5 star hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Best hair dryer I ever purchased. Dries hair fast and doesn’t cause hair to frizz. Has 3 settings which I love as you can adjust while you’re drying your hair. Also like that the hood & height adjusts easily. This is a 5 star hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Beauty shop at home
customer_reviews.text: Every girl needs this product never sat at the beauty shop again for hours wait for your hair to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I deep condition my hair often and ...
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy, but I just put my ear buds in and listen to music or something. I like it. I deep condition my hair often and this is a great simple way to do it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Tate D

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t return it as 30 days had passed. Did not dry evenly or as fast as other options.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Reckon Ionic Hard Bonnet hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: The dryer heats up like a professional dryer. I really like this dryer! The challenge is finding the proper platform or chair to sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Talissa Holland-Huels

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: It seems to dry pretty good. I have locs so it's hard to get them dry away.
customer_reviews.author: JAN ROBBINS

customer_reviews.title: Not made for drying
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Worst item I've ever purchased from Amazon. I waited too long before I opened it and used it, I'm not able to return it. Please don't order this brand of dryer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable sit, poor drying
customer_reviews.text: Came in a damaged box with discolored bonnet and broken ionic function button; will not engage- stuck in on position with no indications ( light )of feature being engaged .Bucket only has one position setting; no adjustability. Feel like air is only coming from bottom row of vents.
customer_reviews.author: g.byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I was not at all impressed with this dryer. I tried it once and it didn’t work well at all. I wish I had returned it but it sat in a closet for too long. Donation $$ to Amazon. I’ll put it on Freecycle I guess :(
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is the noisiest dry i have every had. It gets hot enough but i need ear plugs
customer_reviews.author: Karen T. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: How do I snap close the dryer onvthevdided
customer_reviews.text: I am having issues with closing the dryer tightly to move it with top handle, after reading instructions still can’t it to snap close. I have not figured out how to adjust the height on the dryer after reading instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hylick

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Heat is evenly distributed and get very hot. That is a plus for me. The hood does not stay up for some reason though. When it gets hot it falls down. Its the best on the market I could find.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It does feel like it's cheaply made, but I haven't had any issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tha Book Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Does the job. I have not experienced any problems of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: xwizit

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use to add heat to my deep condition and twist out regimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Dryer.  Neck not flexible.
customer_reviews.text: Good dryer, but can only use it on a table top. I like flexibility in where I dry my hair. I can use this in one location...the dinner room table. The neck does not adjust.
customer_reviews.author: msmik

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I bought it I’ve used it every time I washed my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Keiann Gravesande

customer_reviews.title: It heats up like a professional hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Really great hair dryer. Does what it claims with ease and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Munroe

customer_reviews.title: I had another hair dryer the same but from a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another hair dryer the same but from a different manufacturer. This one is a little stiff when trying to lower the bonnet part. I have used it a month or so and it hasn’t gotten any easier to lower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: This dryer doesn’t dry your whole head. The back of the dryer sits higher than it should!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: One of the WORST products I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I had a dryer similar to this one years ago and this Revlon dryer is the cheapest dryer I've ever seen and I just missed the deadline for returning it. I thought Revlon had better products. The worst don't purchased this item. One of the WORST products I've ever purchased This is just some thin plastic.

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT WAS ONLY USED ONE TIME AND BROKE BEFORE IT COULD GET USED A SECOND TIME.. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS PURPLE PIECE OF CRAP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gets really hot and dries my hair fast! Was actually recommended to me by a friend and I am not disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: It works wonderful it drys my hair all of the way and I have locs

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Product is very flimsy, broke after a month and half of use.

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it has the ion my hair is very frizzy
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it has the ion my hair is very frizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! It does what it needs to do. Good for traveling. Very smooth!

customer_reviews.title: it has height adjustment and cool button for cool drying
customer_reviews.text: it has height adjustment and cool button for cool drying, only 5 start because it is a bit noisy but not overpowering

customer_reviews.title: great item!
customer_reviews.text: like everything regarding the dryer. light and powerful! very quick!

customer_reviews.title: Dryer for hair
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be used for more then a little while, as it gets hot.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the materials.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that there weren't instruction included about different function of the dryer; plastic is flimsy.

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product because it shuts down while drying my hair couldn’t get it started. I wasted my money it’s garbage.

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product didn’t even work , returned and got a refund. Don’t waste your money not worth it!!!!

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: takes forever to heat up,and didnt noticed theres no cold setting

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is portable and can fit on a table or counter

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Does the job great... handle with care (feels a bit "toyish").

customer_reviews.title: It does the job adequately.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike how the head does not adjust well. Too plasticity.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot enough even on high.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get hot enough even on high. I like that it's light weight.

customer_reviews.title: great affordable hooded dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great reasonably priced hooded dryer. easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the secure for the head thingi can broke easily. Don’t let it run for more than 30min ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and well wrap. Be careful with the secure for the head thingi can broke easily. Don’t let it run for more than 30min on medium or high level. Easy to storage. So far pretty good

customer_reviews.title: Wet Hair lives in fear
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses it for heat treated hair dye. Gets the job done fast. Sturdy, easy to use, purple.

customer_reviews.title: GReat item, makes me look beautiful every week
customer_reviews.text: it dries fast and works wonderful. since my husband is a retired hair dresser, i get to get my hair styled at home.
customer_reviews.author: beautiful B

customer_reviews.title: I usually love Revlon products
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I went to set this hair dryer up it broke. A spring popped out of no where then the hood collapsed. I usually love Revlon products. I'm not happy about having to go through the hastle of returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Britany Young

customer_reviews.title: It is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! Worthless piece of junk. First one did no work. I returned it. Used the replacement once and the second time I tried to use it, it just stopped, leaving me with wet hair. I called Amazon. They say they wrote to Revlon. Revlon wrote to tell me to contact Helen of Troy. I contact Helen of Troy, they told me to contact Amazon. Amazon dealt with it, but buyers beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn  R

customer_reviews.title: It Will Do
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a dryer often and don't really need it for something serious. This is nowhere near the quality of something you could have purchased 10 years ago. It is strong enough to dry loose natural 4B hair on the warm setting in about 30 minutes. I don't think it is powerful enough to do much more for me. If I had more space I would buy one on rollers. Unfortunately there aren't a lot of table top dryers on the market. And many of them have the same rating. If you can find better do.
customer_reviews.author: F. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is made out of cheap flimsy plastic. With one drop it will break. Once turned on air only blows out the bottom.of thw bonnet and not the middle or top. My last dryer was much heavier, durable and had a powerful blower. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t look any further. This is for you. I’m a cosmetologist that works alone these days. It works great. I like the Ion choice. It heats twice as fast. It worth your money. It’s a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It started smoking!
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed and set it up and turned on the switch. It didnt make any noise but got extremely hot very quickly and started smoking! Obviously I returned it immediately. Super dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I should have waited and invested my money in a really good dryer. This dryer heating element is very good, don't get me wrong, but that's about the only thing that is good. It is made from cheap plastic, you can tell as soon as you take it out the box. I had to sit there for a couple of minutes to figure out how to adjust the height of the hood. There is no button for cool air, which was a big deal on my last dryer. All in all it's okay, nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: RedLilies

customer_reviews.title: Revlon Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: The product is poorly made. It's nothing but flimsy plastic. Extremely loud and does not circulate the heat all over. I would never recommend buying this Revlon hair dryer. I truly thought I was buying a quality item since it was made by Revlon.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home styling!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for my at home styling. I like the ionic feature— I use it for deep conditioning without the ion, and drying (without rollers) with the ion. My only complaint is that sometimes one side of my hair dries faster than the other so I have to rotate. Otherwise it packs away easily for storage and does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: SR Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Good Dryer!  Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. It works great. It has three different levels and that is good to have if you need to sit under it for any length of time. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bjdixon118

customer_reviews.title: It is fast drying
customer_reviews.text: I love the hair dryer. I have thick hair and it dried my hair faster than other hooded dryers I had before and it dried my hair at the scalp. Usually with other dryers my har is still damp at the roots but not with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jazee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for natural hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. The watt amount makes a huge difference. I have long thick and Afro textured hair and this dryer gives me nice and even heat that gives me the smoothest roller sets
customer_reviews.author: Tondra

customer_reviews.title: this hair dryer,, the fan blows very load ...
customer_reviews.text: this hair dryer,, the fan blows very load ,, very noisy, but io dont feel the heat,,, i thowed the away nit mot i would return it
customer_reviews.author: mima

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a decent hair dryer and this one was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: SOMEONE ELSE'S BEFORE MINE
customer_reviews.text: This item was broken when I received it. The outside finish clearly let me know it was used and returned then repackaged and sold to me. BEWARE I'm sure it can/will happen again.
customer_reviews.author: RED CARPET

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. The detent for adjusting heighth are tight. Sounds like cracking the plastic everytime you move a notch. Dries very quickly on my wife's fine shoulder length hair - (abt 40') on medium.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly mother. With the pandemic she had to quit going to the beauty shop so I needed a way to dry her hair when I shampooed and rolled it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: It's good quality, but it's  too hot
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like it because in order to dry my hair I have to put it on high, and it is terribly hot, and the medium takes longer to dry.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color - my favorite of course. It is convenient and it WORKS. That dryer really works. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Great hooded dryer
customer_reviews.text: With the ionic setting on it dries my hair, but doesn't dry out my hair!!! Also great for deep conditioning and roller sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is a disgrace. It won't stay up over the head. Everytime I put it up and sit under it, it continously drop on my head. So now to dry my hair I have to hold it up. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Spice

customer_reviews.title: high drying power
customer_reviews.text: I like this dryer it works for what I need it to do. The drying power is high and you don't have to sit under it for a long time to get hair dry and it stores easily in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate a dryer that can dry your hair quickly and be put away when done.

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: love tbis dryer. Nothing bad to say about it. Worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: Dries well but too bulky and restrictive.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little too restrictive for my needs. Dries well but too big for travel other then auto.
customer_reviews.author: S. Freeman

product_meta.title: Revlon Ionic Hard Bonnet Hair Dryer
product_meta.description: Revlon Hair Tools is dedicated to helping women achieve beautiful hair they'll love! Whether women desire gorgeous blowouts, big enviable waves, striking straight locks, or the perfect fashion accessory to complete the look, Revlon has the styling tools you desire. About the Product: For perfect hands-free hair drying, the Revlon Ionic Hard Bonnet Hair Dryer features a balanced airflow design to dry your hair quickly and evenly. A large, round hood comfortably fits a set of jumbo hair rollers, and the hair dryer's collapsible design makes storage and travel easier. This Revlon Hard Bonnet Hair Dryer is complete with IONIC TECHNOLOGY that helps maintain a neutral charge leaving hair smooth, shiny, and with less frizz. Bonnet dryer versatility is maximized with 2 Heats/Speeds that provide optimum control for complete drying and hairstyling flexibility. Get beautiful salon results at home.
feature_bullets: The Revlon Emits Ions to reduce frizz. Large Round Hood Accommodates a Set of Jumbo Hair Rollers
Collapsible Design Makes Storage and Travel Easier
Ion On/Off Switch with "On" Indicator Light
3 Temperature Settings: Low, Medium and High
